edu.brown.cs.gajith.boggle

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.brown.cs.gajith.boggle.Board

  • public class Board
extends Object
    A single configuration of dice in a 4 x 4 layout. A Board contains four rows and columns, numbered from 0,0 at the top left.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Create a new, random board by rolling the dice in a standard Boggle set.
      Board(String s)
      Create a specific board specified by the letters in s.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String get(int r, int c)
      Return the String fragment represented by the Die face at the given row and column.
      Set<String> play()
      Find all words that can found in this Board according to boggle rules.
      static int score(String word)
      Score a word according to standard Boggle rules.
      String toString()
      Return a human readable version of this Board.

      Return a human readable version of this Board.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Create a new, random board by rolling the dice in a standard Boggle set.

      • Board

        public Board(String s)
        Create a specific board specified by the letters in s.
        Parameters:
        s - A string containing 16 letters in the range 'a'..'z' which are placed in the board, row by row, starting from the left. Any other letters are discarded. 'q' implies 'qu' for that position.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Return a human readable version of this Board.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        4 lines of 4 characters, representing the 4 rows of letters shown on the dice in this Board.

      • toString

        public String toString(char separator)
        Return a human readable version of this Board.
        Parameters:
        separator - A character used to separate the four rows.
        Returns:
        4 string of 4 characters, joined by separator

      • get

        public String get(int r,
                  int c)
        Return the String fragment represented by the Die face at the given row and column. It is a String because the letter 'q' yields 'qu'.
        Parameters:
        r - The row, running from 0 at the top, to 3 at the bottom.
        c - The column, running from 0 on the left to 3 on the right.
        Returns:
        The part of a word (usually one letter) that available at r, c, or the empty string if r,c is off the board.

      • play

        public Set<String> play()
        Find all words that can found in this Board according to boggle rules. Those rules allow movement horizontally, vertically, and diagonally, without revisting the same space twice in one word.
        Returns:
        A set containing the words (which may include non-scoring words, such as "to").

      • score

        public static int score(String word)
        Score a word according to standard Boggle rules.
        Parameters:
        word - The word to be scored. The word is presumed legal.
        Returns:
        The score.
